name: SilverGlass theme for Firefox
description: A semi transparent gray theme for your Firefox browser.
additional_info: This theme was optimized for Firefox 11, 12 (beta), 13 (aurora), and 14 (nightly build).  It will work for any Firefox version 4 and above but will look best for Firefox 11.  I will try to keep this theme updated as new versions of Firefox are released.
